rule:
output_device_data(DeviceDataList) :- 
    findall(DeviceData, (
        device(_, DeviceId, Idevid, Name),
        is_of_device_type(_, DeviceId, DeviceTypeId),
        device_type(_, DeviceTypeId, DeviceType),
        manufactured(_, DeviceId, ManufacturerId),
        manufacturer(_, ManufacturerId, Manufacturer),
        format(atom(DeviceData), 'Device Name: ~w, Device Type: ~w, Manufacturer: ~w, Idevid: ~w', [Name, DeviceType, Manufacturer, Idevid])
    ), DeviceDataList).
